title: CP not working?
body:
Greetings,

I have a problem - my champion mastery not longer works. Whenever the battle is over the CP is stuck loading, it worked well at first, then it just.... stopped... help?

replies.body: At your time of posting, [this was a known issue](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/BVhze4Vn-champion-mastery-not-displaying-correctly). You should still be getting your mastery points, so no need to [fret](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6WQDYCW6_t8).
